name: Paul Landers
description: '''Paul Landers''' (born '''Heiko Paul Hiersche'''; 9 December 1964) is a German musician, best known as the rhythm guitarist of [[Neue Deutsche HÃ¤rte]] band [[Rammstein]], and [[punk rock]] bands [[Feeling B]] and [[First Arsch]]. Landers has released eight studio albums and three live albums with Rammstein.
